website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon D500 puts the company's finest autofocus system in a tough, compact SLR body that will please demanding enthusiasts and pros alike.
cons: Snapbridge wireless transfer needs some work

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research on what camera to get to upgrade my 7200 . I favour wildlife / birds and this was billed as the best . 1 day of photographing even in the garden and I can see this is the right choice . Would say though get a lens to compliment it , don't squander its potential .
customer_reviews.author: Sean G

customer_reviews.title: Happy man
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of older Nikon bodies and lenses and as my job is in video production (and multimedia), I decided to look for a camera that will also let me film in 4k (and take my lenses).... so after much research I went for this Nikon and it arrived today. I was hesitant about this being a 'grey' with the price, but I'm happy to say that it was very well packaged... plus I have run a few tests already and am very pleased with the results! (So it seems all the rave reviews are well founded)
customer_reviews.author: IanRoss

customer_reviews.title: Best camera on the market for this price.
customer_reviews.text: Forget mirrorless and full frame. This camera is a dx sensor camera and it's unreal. You can use fx lenses on this body and they work so well, giving you the best part of the lens. Super fast camera, excellent viewfinder, top notch picture quality. It has a light body and a nice hand grip. Ps. The tilt touch screen is just great. Well done Nikon. Top marks A++++
customer_reviews.author: mr j a halls

customer_reviews.title: What a camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera. The ‘keeper’ rate with 10 frames per second makes choosing which of the pin sharp and perfectly exposed shots to keep very difficult; what a dilemma!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Littlechild

customer_reviews.title: A Good Nikon!
customer_reviews.text: This Camera does exactly what it promises - but is only as clever as the User makes it!
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Rennie

customer_reviews.title: IT IS FAST IN ,EVERY ASPECT......... Go Get One,..... FAST !
customer_reviews.text: Mainly for b.i.f. shots and it is fast,focus tracking and lock on are very good,best I have ever seen And crop factor gives my Nikon 300mm telephoto lens. A boost to 450mm and when I got my Nikon X2 teleconverter fitted it doubled to almost 900 mm. With a loss of two stops of light which,on a sunny day is fine.GREAT CAM. BRILLiant NIKON THE BEST DSLR IN THE WORLD IS NIKON D5 PRICE. £6000, I BOUGHT NIKON D500 FOR LESS THAN A QUARTER OF THAT. And it is a miniature of it's much bigger professional cam. Buy the D500 It is simply brilliant
customer_reviews.author: john k.

customer_reviews.title: ou do not get a Nikon Guarantee
customer_reviews.text: Well it does what it said on the tin, however it doesn’t have a guarantee certificate with it so I assume it’s a grey import?? Will try and find out when I try to register it with Nikon uk. but you have to pay if you want a guarantee from Amazon. i think this is wrong as i should have at least a 1 year free guarantee???? but i did pay maybe this is wrong and i have been shafted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Simply stunning low-light pictures. I took the plunge to upgrade my D300 to the D500. It's costly, but the kids really didn't need to eat for a couple of weeks. It's worth every penny. I was surprised at how quickly the children recovered the weight loss. You know you want it. It's a great camera that really does live up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Just in a different league
customer_reviews.text: I've used Sony Nex6, a6000, a57 and A77ii (mark 2), none come close to The Nikon d500 for accurate focus. All mirroless camera restrict the speed of light because of the EVF.
customer_reviews.author: MR MUTT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to all the great reviews on the web. Put this with some decent glass and it’s a winning combo.
customer_reviews.author: JasonH

customer_reviews.title: A stunning piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: As soon as i started shooting this camera, i could feel we were one. Very well designed, outstanding picture quality. Most impressive low noise at high iso. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera. I wont do a full review as ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. I wont do a full review as there are hundreds saying how good it is all over the net but you won't be disappointed with this baby!
customer_reviews.author: PaulHR

customer_reviews.title: fantastic camera and lens kit i can't praise this kit ...
customer_reviews.text: fantastic camera and lens kit i can't praise this kit enough it is everything i need and more top marks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: rex

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, upgraded from the D7100 and paired it with the 17-55 2.8. The system will be more than sufficient for a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Laurynas Zubrickas

customer_reviews.title: always good! Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Delivered early, always good! Perfect condition, and loving my new camera. Gavin
customer_reviews.author: Gavin McLauchlan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant camera
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant camera, arrived fast, upgraded from D701 well worth the extra money for fast focus & shooting in low light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera. Positively encourages to go fully manual
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. Positively encourages to go fully manual. Controls are well laid out. Only drawback is that it won't work on 3rd party batteries, need Nikon batteries
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera - watch out for Amazon imports
customer_reviews.text: Great camera that does everything you need, fits into the hand perfectly and nicely balanced weight with heavy lenses. However I noticed the 20mp sensor is overly sharp (can be fine tuned in settings) and the contrast curve is a little too high causing highlights to burn a little easier than the D7200. Also sent a used model from Amazon with damaged screen cover and shutter count over 200, as well as a foreign manual, so returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but I bought mine for £1,350-00 and I got a 3 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: albert horsborough

customer_reviews.title: ... this is camera as i needed something different with good spec technology and well focus system its amaze
customer_reviews.text: I was bought this is camera as i needed something different with good spec technology and well focus system its amaze . My sample of birds shoot with ordinary lens TAMRON 18-300 .
customer_reviews.author: Piotr

product_meta.title: Nikon D500 Body Single-Lens Reflex Digital Camera-Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Single-Lens Reflex Digital CameraD500 body is a compact powerhouse fusing the highest performance of Nikon's professional D5 with the unique agility of the DX format. Portable and powerful, the D500 will galvanize the way you shoot stills and video. Designed with powerful new 153-point AF system delivers superior subject acquisition performance across a wider range of situations. 4K UHD video (30p), suitable for professional productions. Snap Bridge support lets you connect the camera to a compatible smart device via built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x D500 Body Single-lens Reflex Digital Camera
feature_bullets: Lens mount is Nikon F mount (with AF coupling and AF contacts)
Total pixels are 21.51 million.Designed with effective pixels of 20.9 million
Frame coverage:DX (24x16) image area: Approx. 100% horizontal and 100% vertical, 1.3x (18x12) image area: Approx. 98% horizontal and 98% vertical

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
